dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, okay, so did you see this, um, the news about the Head of State?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, okay, so did you see this, um, the news about the Head of State?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, YES! Carol Miller, from the US House! I mean, wow!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, Y E S! Carol Miller, from the U S House! I mean, wow!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State received a member of the US House of Representatives Carol Miller, according to a statement from Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right?! They said it's like, a new impetus for cooperation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right?! They said it's like, a new impetus for cooperation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev emphasized that this meeting is important for giving a new impetus to cooperation between the two states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, exactly! A new impetus. Like, so important.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh, exactly! A new impetus. Like, so important.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And that the US has been a reliable partner since Kazakhstan’s independence?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And that the U S has been a reliable partner since Kazakhstan's independence?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to him, since the first days of Kazakhstan's independence, the United States has been a reliable partner of our country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! They’ve like, always been there. So many achievements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! They've like, always been there. So many achievements.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Regional and international security, nuclear non-proliferation…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Regional and international security, nuclear non-proliferation...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Kazakhstan noted joint achievements in such key areas as regional and international security, nuclear non-proliferation, as well as trade, economic and investment cooperation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and the trade! And investment cooperation!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and the trade! And investment cooperation!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Kazakhstan noted joint achievements in such key areas as regional and international security, nuclear non-proliferation, as well as trade, economic and investment cooperation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the trade turnover is over four billion dollars! Uh, that's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the trade turnover is over four billion dollars! Uh, that's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He emphasized that trade turnover between the states demonstrates steady growth and has already exceeded the mark of 4 billion dollars.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: WILD! And she, um, thanked him for the warm welcome. So sweet!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: W I L D! And she, um, thanked him for the warm welcome. So sweet!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In turn, the congresswoman thanked the President for the warm welcome and emphasized the interest of the United States in continuing a fruitful dialogue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But also, you know, it shows the US is really interested in keeping this dialogue going.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But also, you know, it shows the U S is really interested in keeping this dialogue going.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In turn, the congresswoman thanked the President for the warm welcome and emphasized the interest of the United States in continuing a fruitful dialogue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally! They talked about energy projects, infrastructure…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally! They talked about energy projects, infrastructure...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Particular attention was paid to the implementation of energy and infrastructure projects, the development of digital technologies and artificial intelligence, as well as the expansion of transport and logistics links between states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And digital tech, like, AI!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And digital tech, like, A I!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Particular attention was paid to the implementation of energy and infrastructure projects, the development of digital technologies and artificial intelligence, as well as the expansion of transport and logistics links between states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: AI! And expanding transport links, um, between them!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A I! And expanding transport links, um, between them!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Particular attention was paid to the implementation of energy and infrastructure projects, the development of digital technologies and artificial intelligence, as well as the expansion of transport and logistics links between states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then the energy ministers met earlier, too, at CERAWeek 2025!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then the energy ministers met earlier, too, at CERAWeek twenty twenty five!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Minister of Energy of Kazakhstan Almassadam Satkaliyev and US Secretary of Energy Chris Wright held talks within the framework of the international energy conference CERAWeek 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right?! It’s all just… it's so much good news!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right?! It's all just... it's so much good news!
